Posts.Content: Mouth Ulcer Solution - cheap $2 Cat annoying kids to Laser - Red Only.. Welcome to the 21st Century guys - I found this and it works.. about 2 weeks ago.. My dentist used a 2Watt Dental laser on my sores and Ulcers and relief in hours, next day the sores are gone.. Red is the only one that works, due to the 650 nm frequency of the light?? Seriously read and try it.. Here is a link with the procedure, from the States.. https://www.drbobsfamilydental.com/2017/02/10/red-laser-pen-to-treat-canker-mouth-sores/ Youtube Dental laser in action below.. https://youtu.be/bs2PJv2DUcY https://youtu.be/LUVzKE3QEoE I have one next to my toothbrush for day 7 to 10 oafter chemo be worse then.. All the best..
Posts.Title: Pesky mouth ulcers driving me crazy
